MS MCQs

    Simplify device management with Microsoft Endpoint Manager

    »

    1. Which of the following enables organizations to create self-contained provisioning packages?

      Windows Configuration Designer

      Microsoft Intune

      Microsoft Autopilot


    2. What additional security measure is suggested for users that want to access corporate applications on their own devices?

      Limit users to web-based apps requiring HTTPS.

      Require the implementation of a virtual private network (VPN)

      Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA)


    3. Which of the following statements is correct?

      Configuration Manager manages both on-premises infrastructure and cloud-based functions

      Configuration Manager manages on-premises infrastructure and Intune manages cloud-based functions

      Windows autopilot is the new method for infrastructure management for both on-premises and cloud-based scenarios.


    4. When using Windows Autopilot to configure a user’s device, which of the following statements describe the only interaction required from the end user?

      Connect to a network and then start the Intune client.

      Connect to a network and verify their credentials.

      Connect to a network and then run a PowerShell script (provided by IT) to connect to the Autopilot server.
